@@ -211,5 +211,0 @@ - * @implSpec - * Arenas obtained from the factory methods {@linkplain #ofAuto()}, {@linkplain #global()} - * {@linkplain #ofConfined()} and, {@linkplain #ofShared()} will return segments - * that are zeroed out when invoking {@linkplain Arena#allocate(long, long) allocate()}. - * @@ -227,0 +222,3 @@ + *

+ * Memory segments {@linkplain #allocate(long, long) allocated} by the returned arena + * are zero initialized. @@ -239,0 +237,3 @@ + *

+ * Memory segments {@linkplain #allocate(long, long) allocated} by the returned arena + * are zero initialized. @@ -251,0 +252,3 @@ + *

+ * Memory segments {@linkplain #allocate(long, long) allocated} by the returned arena + * are zero initialized. @@ -259,0 +263,3 @@ + *

+ * Memory segments {@linkplain #allocate(long, long) allocated} by the returned arena + * are zero initialized.
